name: dancey
description: Share music collections, trade physical media and leave ratings and reviews. Like Discogs, but this one isn't real.

scripts.bk_heroku_postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend
scripts.dev: concurrently --names "Server,Client" -c "bgBlue.dim,bgGreen.dim" "true && npm run server" "npm run frontend"
scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd frontend && npm run build --prod && cp -r build ../
scripts.deploy:full: func() { npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m "Build: $1" && npm run deploy; }; func

author: Nash Sibanda
